members.name: association
members.comment: Returns the association that this notification is applicable to.

return: The association that failed to send, or null if there is no association, that is, the notification follows a AssociationChangeNotification.AssocChangeEvent.CANT_START
The peer primary address of the association or the address that the message was sent to

members.name: buffer
members.comment: Returns the data that was to be sent.

return: The user data. The buffers position will be 0 and its limit will be set to the end of the data.

members.name: errorCode
members.comment: Returns the error code. The errorCode gives the reason why the send failed, and if set, will be a SCTP protocol error code as defined in RFC2960 section 3.3.10

members.name: streamNumber
members.comment: Returns the stream number that the messge was to be sent on.
Initializes a new instance of this class.

name: com.sun.nio.sctp.SendFailedNotification
comment:
Notification emitted when a send failed notification has been received.

A send failed notification indicates that a message cannot be delivered. Typically this is because the association has been shutdown with unsent data in the socket output buffer, or in the case of a SctpMultiChannel the association failed to setup.
